title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.54 - Burn center
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.54 - Burn center

State Regulations
A burn unit (see section
444.18
[b][5]
of
this Article for the definition of a burn care unit) with an emphasis on
research and teaching, where the intensive care environment serves as a
classroom for teaching the complexities of burn care and a laboratory for
research. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.54

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
